biotools.summary: Automatic Statistical Identification in Complex Spectra quantifies concentration of metabolites in a complex spectrum. The identification of metabolites is performed by fitting a mixture model to the spectra of the library with a sparse penalty.

bioschemas.name: ASICS
bioschemas.summary: Automatic Statistical Identification in Complex Spectra quantifies concentration of metabolites in a complex spectrum. The identification of metabolites is performed by fitting a mixture model to the spectra of the library with a sparse penalty.
